Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi everbody,

I would like to finish the migration from Ant to Maven. This means that
JUnit cannot be build with Ant anymore. Is there anybody out there who
relies on JUnit's build.xml?

Best Regards,
Stefan

--001a11c2e60a61dfbb04ecd0c6f8
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1

<div dir="ltr"><div><div><div>Hi everbody,<br><br></div>I would like to finish the migration from Ant to Maven. This means that JUnit cannot be build with Ant anymore. Is there anybody out there who relies on JUnit's build.xml?<br>
<br></div>Best Regards,<br></div>Stefan<br></div>

--001a11c2e60a61dfbb04ecd0c6f8--
